rules_text:
Training
[i]Green Knight Growths[/i] – Other Knights you control have training. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put onto a creature you control, that creature gains trample until end of turn.
[i]Promote Bonuses[/i] – Whenever a creature you control transforms or becomes promoted, put a menace counter on them.
Partner with Cain, The First Red Knight
